gateway_identity.name: The Everything Gateway
gateway_identity.purpose: Your single portal to the entire internet
gateway_identity.description: Beautifully organized access to search engines, tools, entertainment, knowledge, and more

category_search-engines.name: Search Engines
category_search-engines.description: Your gateway to the entire search universe - mainstream, privacy-focused, academic, and hidden gems

category_tools.name: Tools & Utilities
category_tools.description: Essential tools for productivity - PDF editors, AI assistants, image processors, and developer utilities

category_entertainment.name: Entertainment & Media
category_entertainment.description: Your gateway to streaming, music, gaming, and entertainment platforms

category_knowledge.name: Knowledge & Learning
category_knowledge.description: Wikipedia, educational resources, archives, and learning platforms for curious minds

category_anime.name: Anime & Manga
category_anime.description: Immerse yourself in Japanese animation and comics with streaming platforms, reading sites, and otaku communities

category_crypto.name: Crypto & Blockchain
category_crypto.description: Navigate the digital economy with cryptocurrency exchanges, DeFi protocols, NFT marketplaces, and blockchain analytics

category_gaming.name: Gaming & Esports
category_gaming.description: Level up your gaming experience with digital stores, streaming platforms, and gaming communities

category_health.name: Health & Fitness
category_health.description: Transform your wellness journey with fitness apps, nutrition tracking, mental health resources, and workout platforms

category_design.name: Design & Creativity
category_design.description: Unleash your creative potential with professional design tools, stock resources, inspiration platforms, and collaboration spaces

category_lifestyle.name: Lifestyle & Shopping
category_lifestyle.description: Transform your daily life with e-commerce giants, travel platforms, food delivery, and home services

category_news.name: News & Trends
category_news.description: Stay informed with global news sources, tech publications, specialized journalism, and trend tracking platforms

category_social.name: Social Networks
category_social.description: Connect and engage with communities through social platforms, professional networks, forums, and communication tools

category_hidden-treasures.name: Hidden Treasures
category_hidden-treasures.description: The internet's best-kept secrets. Powerful tools and hidden gems that insiders use but rarely share. Welcome to the underground.

quick_answers.what_is_this: The Everything Gateway is your single portal to the entire internet with 577+ resources across 13 categories.
quick_answers.how_many_categories: We have 13 categories covering everything from search engines to entertainment to productivity tools.
quick_answers.how_many_resources: Over 577 carefully curated resources across all categories.
quick_answers.whats_new: Check our latest updates and new categories like Hidden Treasures with exclusive tools.
quick_answers.how_to_search: Use Ctrl+K to open universal search, or click the search button to find anything across all platforms.
quick_answers.categories_list: Search Engines, Tools & Utilities, Entertainment & Media, Knowledge & Learning, Anime & Manga, Crypto & Blockchain, Gaming & Esports, Health & Fitness, Design & Creativity, Lifestyle & Shopping, News & Trends, Social Networks, Hidden Treasures

navigation_help.search_shortcut: Press Ctrl+K to open universal search
navigation_help.mobile_search: Tap the floating search button on mobile
navigation_help.category_access: Click any category card to explore its resources
navigation_help.favorites: Heart icon to save your favorite platforms
navigation_help.breadcrumbs: Use breadcrumb navigation to go back

common_queries.ai_tools: You can find AI tools in the Tools & Utilities category, AI & ML section
common_queries.search_engines: The Search Engines category has 39+ search engines across 9 different types
common_queries.entertainment: Check Entertainment & Media for streaming, music, and gaming platforms
common_queries.pdf_tools: PDF utilities are in the Tools & Utilities category, PDF Tools section
common_queries.design_tools: Design & Creativity category has professional design tools and resources
common_queries.crypto: Crypto & Blockchain category covers trading, DeFi, NFTs, and analytics
common_queries.anime: Anime & Manga category has streaming platforms, manga readers, and databases
common_queries.gaming: Gaming & Esports category includes game stores, streaming, and communities
common_queries.news: News & Trends category has global news sources and tech publications
common_queries.social: Social Networks category includes social media, forums, and communication tools
